title: mystery with ArrayList and int parameter

content.description: Consider the following data field and method.
content.question: private ArrayList list; public void mystery(int n) { for (int k = 0; k < n; k++) { Object obj = list.remove(0); list.add(obj); } } Assume that list has been initialized with the following Integer objects. [12, 9, 7, 8, 4, 3, 6, 11, 1] Which of the following represents the list as a result of a call to mystery(3)?

skill.text: 3.B: Determine the result or output based on code that contains data abstractions.
